name: jb-next
short_description:
Web browsing refined. A fluid and up-to-date experience with Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome.

Free and Open Source Software (FOSS)
Repo: https://github.com/justbrowsing/jb-next

Based on ArchLinux x86_64.
An official JustBrowsing flavor.

Looking for the original JustBrowsing?
http://justbrowsing.info/#sf
https://sourceforge.net/projects/justbrowsing/
